title: Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard, 61 Keys Compact Mechanical Keyboard w/White and Grey Color Keycaps, Linear Red Switch, Pro Driver/Software Supported
descriptions:
Meet the Redragon K617 Fizz — a 60% wired RGB gaming keyboard built to win more space, speed, and style on your desk. Its compact 61-key layout frees up mouse room for cleaner flicks and faster aim, perfect for FPS gamers who demand precision.

- Ultra-responsive Linear Red switches: smooth, quiet, and fast with soft key travel for rapid double-taps and clutch strafes. Rated for 50 million keypresses to outlast countless matches.
- Hot-swappable sockets: customize your feel in seconds. Swap compatible mechanical switches without soldering.
- Vibrant per-key RGB: choose from 20 dynamic presets and dial in brightness and flow speed to match your setup or mood.
- Pro-grade software: unlock full control with macros, custom keybindings, and shortcuts. Design lighting modes, layer effects, and tailor your layout for every game or workflow.
- Clean, modern aesthetic: two-tone white and grey keycaps blend minimal style with gamer edge.
- Wired reliability: zero-lag performance and consistent power for tournament-ready stability.
- Space-savvy design: compact form factor optimizes your workspace and mouse range for peak performance.

If you’re chasing faster reactions, a tighter setup, and a keyboard that bends to your playstyle, the Redragon K617 Fizz delivers pro features without the premium price. Plug in, light it up, and take control.
